name: inflected
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
language An inflected form of a word has a changed spelling or ending that shows the way it is used in sentences: "Finds" and "found" are inflected forms of "find".
slightly changed by the influence of a particular thing: music subtly inflected with jazz a politically inflected play
